item.title: 07/22/2024 Call between the NRC and TRISO-X staff regarding chemical safety to discuss technical items related to the license application for a fuel fabrication facility.

item.title: 07/17/2024 Call between the NRC and TRISO-X staff to continue discussions regarding the NRC request to supplement the requests for additional information (RAIs) related to management measures.
item.author: NRC/NMSS
